name: Joyeux Voucher
desc:
Vouchers found inside Voucher Boxes throughout the Veluriyam Mirage. They are exquisitely made and come in vivid colors. Just gripping them in your hand seems to impart the joy of winning a reward.
Can be used to unlock valuable rewards during the "Secret Summer Paradise" event.

value.text: Obtain from the "Secret Summer Paradise" event

customize.text:
Joyeux Vouchers can be found in various places all over the Veluriyam Mirage.
Collect Voucher Boxes and open Fascinating Chests to collect Joyeux Vouchers and obtain precious materials and rewards...

When you have exchanged a certain amount of rewards, you can obtain the gadget known as the Flowing Joyspar, which can detect Joyeux Vouchers within a set area.
Use this item to find Vouchers more easily.

When you have exchanged a certain amount of rewards, you can obtain a more effective gadget known as the Felicitous Joyspar, which can detect all Joyeux Vouchers within the Veluriyam Mirage.
Use this item to be more efficient in your search for the Joyeux Vouchers.
